title: Google\Cloud\Dlp\V2\CustomInfoType_DetectionRule_HotwordRule
name: CustomInfoType_DetectionRule_HotwordRule
description:
Detection rule that adjusts the likelihood of findings within a certain proximity of hotwords.

Generated from protobuf message google.privacy.dlp.v2.CustomInfoType.DetectionRule.HotwordRule

Extends \Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

methods.name: getHotwordRegex
methods.description:
Regex pattern defining what qualifies as a hotword.

Generated from protobuf field .google.privacy.dlp.v2.CustomInfoType.Regex hotword_regex = 1;

methods.name: setHotwordRegex
methods.description:
Regex pattern defining what qualifies as a hotword.

Generated from protobuf field .google.privacy.dlp.v2.CustomInfoType.Regex hotword_regex = 1;

params.name: var
params.description: Regex pattern defining what qualifies as a hotword.

methods.name: getProximity
methods.description:
Proximity of the finding within which the entire hotword must reside.

The total length of the window cannot exceed 1000 characters. Note that the finding itself will be included in the window, so that hotwords may be used to match substrings of the finding itself. For example, the certainty of a phone number regex "(\d{3}) \d{3}-\d{4}" could be adjusted upwards if the area code is known to be the local area code of a company office using the hotword regex "(xxx)", where "xxx" is the area code in question.

Generated from protobuf field .google.privacy.dlp.v2.CustomInfoType.DetectionRule.Proximity proximity = 2;

methods.description:
Proximity of the finding within which the entire hotword must reside.

Generated from protobuf field .google.privacy.dlp.v2.CustomInfoType.DetectionRule.Proximity proximity = 2;

methods.description:
Likelihood adjustment to apply to all matching findings.

Generated from protobuf field .google.privacy.dlp.v2.CustomInfoType.DetectionRule.LikelihoodAdjustment likelihood_adjustment = 3;
